author: RTÉ News
title: Liverpool-Atletico virus link 'interesting hypothesis'
description: The deputy chief scientific adviser to the British government has said it is an "interesting hypothesis" that Liverpool's Champions League match against Atletico Madrid may have spread coronavirus in the city.
content:
The deputy chief scientific adviser to the British government has said it is an "interesting hypothesis" that Liverpool's Champions League match against Atletico Madrid may have spread coronavirus in the city.
More than 3,000 fans made the trip from the Span… [+2540 chars]
